org.sd.extract
Class HeadingOrganizer.IndexHeadingStack

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.extract.HeadingOrganizer.HeadingStack
      org.sd.extract.HeadingOrganizer.IndexHeadingStack
Enclosing class:
HeadingOrganizer
public static final class HeadingOrganizer.IndexHeadingStack
extends HeadingOrganizer.HeadingStack

Container class to hold a stack of headings with their range of influence.

Constructor Summary
HeadingOrganizer.IndexHeadingStack(java.util.List<Extraction> headings, int startIndex, int endIndex)
          Construct a heading stack whose range of influence is between startIndex (exclusive) and endIndex (exclusive).
 
Method Summary
 int getEndIndex()
          Get the end index for this heading stack's range of influence.

Constructor Detail

HeadingOrganizer.IndexHeadingStack

public HeadingOrganizer.IndexHeadingStack(java.util.List<Extraction> headings,
                                          int startIndex,
                                          int endIndex)
Construct a heading stack whose range of influence is between startIndex (exclusive) and endIndex (exclusive).

Note that startIndex is the pathIndex of the last heading in the stack.

Method Detail

getStartIndex

public int getStartIndex()
Get the start index for this heading stack's range of influence.

NOTE: This will be the path index of the lowest heading in the stack.

getEndIndex

public int getEndIndex()
Get the end index for this heading stack's range of influence.

NOTE: This will be the path index of the next heading stack's top heading, or indicates the end of the document if -1.
